name: Alsoviewed for woocommerce
author: Abdel-latif Ahmed Henno

sections.description:
Take an action today and increase conversion. AlsoViewed is a light-weight plugin that displays the most viewed products in your store.

✯ Inspired by Amazon High Conversion Tools that drive sales up

✯ Live statistics on products your web store visitors have viewed

✯ Product Limit

✯ Unlimited color schema

✯ Easy configuration

✯ Responsive Slider

More plugins ?? please see my profile http://goo.gl/5IqIyP

A brief Markdown Example

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload alsoviewed-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. This show products slider in product page
